title: Open Data in a Day, 28 October, 2013

details.description:
Practicalities

Refreshments and lunch will be provided throughout the day. Free Wi-Fi available. Please arrive by 9.15am to help us start at 9.30am.
details.alternative_title: Course: Open Data for Marketers, 28 October 2013
details.location: Open Data Institute, 65 Clifton Street, London, EC2A 4JE
